TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RichTextBoxFinds extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何在 控件中执行文本搜索。

span.span: Specifies how a text search is carried out in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序中定位文本通过调用控件方法控件。An application locates text in the control by calling the method of the control. 此枚举可用于指定如何执行搜索时调用方法。This enumeration enables you to specify how the search is performed when the method is called. 可以从此枚举来指定多个搜索选项，在调用时的一个或多个值进行组合方法。You can combine one or more values from this enumeration to specify more than one search option when calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例搜索的全部内容搜索字符串的第一个实例传递给方法的文本参数。The following example searches the entire contents of a for the first instance of a search string passed into the text parameter of the method. 搜索起始位置由该方法的 start 参数指定。The search starting location is specified by the start parameter of the method. 如果在中找到的搜索字符串，该方法返回找到的文本的第一个字符的索引位置，并突出显示找到的文本; 否则，它将返回值-1。If the search string is found in the , the method returns the index location of the first character of the found text and highlights the found text; otherwise, it returns a value of -1. 该示例还指定在搜索匹配指定的搜索字符串的大小写的选项。The example also specifies options in the search to match the case of the specified search string. 该示例假定此方法所在的类中包含名为`richTextBox1`。The example assumes that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a named `richTextBox1`. 找到搜索文本的第一个实例来查找文本的其他实例后执行"查找下一个"的类型操作时，你可以使用此示例。You can use this example when performing a "Find Next" type operation once the first instance of search text has been found to find other instances of the text. [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.Find2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.Find2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.Find2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.Find2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.Find2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.Find2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds MatchCase = int32(4)

summary.span: 仅定位大小写正确的搜索文本的实例。

span.span: Locate only instances of the search text that have the exact casing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds NoHighlight = int32(8)

summary.span: 如果找到搜索文本，不突出显示它。

span.span: The search text, if found, should not be highlighted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds None = int32(0)

summary.span: 定位搜索文本的所有实例，而不论在搜索中找到的实例是否是全字。

span.span: Locate all instances of the search text, whether the instances found in the search are whole words or not.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds Reverse = int32(16)

summary.span: 搜索在控件文档的结尾处开始，并搜索到文档的开头。

span.span: The search starts at the end of the control's document and searches to the beginning of the document.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds WholeWord = int32(2)

summary.span: 仅定位是全字的搜索文本的实例。

span.span: Locate only instances of the search text that are whole words.
